title: Dolls (TEFC)
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Children - Social life and customs - Study and teaching (Primary)
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Teaching - Aids and devices
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Child development
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Child development
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Children - Social life and customs - Study and teaching (Primary)
description: Indicates how realistic play with dolls helps children learn about human relationships and come to terms with babies in their own families. The class watches while a child's mother washes and dresses her baby and the children copy her with their dolls.
